hero.title: The power of collective
hero.description: You offer more than possessions when you give, true giving is an extension of yourself

education.title: Education
education.description: We believe in empowering minds through education. We stand for providing equal access to knowledge, as we promote a brighter future for all.

solidarity.title: Solidarity
solidarity.description: We believe in fostering a sense of community by providing support to the less privileged. We promote solidarity and togetherness as we stand for a united and cohesive society

health.title: Health
health.description: We believe in promoting a healthy society. We stand for providing essential healthcare support, ensuring the well-being of all as we strive for a healthier community.

meals.title: 30k
meals.description: In the course of 3 years, charities in algeria managed to provide up to 1200 meal per day in ramadan; an average of 30.000 meals served in one month.

orphans.description: 50 to 200 orphans per state had been equipped with essential school supplies this school year, ensuring they have the tools they need to thrive in their education.

refugees.title: 25k
refugees.description: Over 25.000 refugees had been hosted in Algeria for the last 5 years, which many needed clothing, as well as a shelter.

fact.title: Fact
fact.description: The acute malnutrition rate among children aged 0 to 5 years worldwide was 10.7%.
